{{cpp/experimental/reflect/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=reflection_ts | header=experimental/reflect | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept LambdaCapture = Variable&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; /* see below */;
}}

The {{tt|LambdaCapture}} concept is satisfied if and only if T reflects a lambda capture as introduced by the capture list or by capture defaults. (Note: The {{tt|Scope}} of a {{tt|LambdaCapture}} is its immediately enclosing {{tt|Lambda}}).
